name: ORS Prisoners Without Visit History
description:
The report prompts for an establishment code at runtime. This report provides a list of prisoners who have not had a visit on their current booking and includes reception date to the current establishment and count of days since reception.
VIS0007 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 07/05/2020

dataset.name: No Visits
dataset.query: MVMT_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TIME AS MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID ) AND (  AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND ( AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE ) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.TO_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION = 'Admission' AND AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS TODAY_, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, MAX(MVMT_.MOVEMENT_TIME) OVER (PARTITION BY MVMT_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS MAX_MOVEMENT_TIME FROM MVMT_, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = MVMT_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END = 'Normal Completion' AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE <= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, DESCRIPTION, TODAY_, AGY_LOC_ID, MAX_MOVEMENT_TIME, (TO_DATE(MAX_MOVEMENT_TIME, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TODAY_, 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AS V_DAYS_FROM_RECEPTION FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @prompt('Establishment Code','A','Visit History\Establishment Code Where Visit Held',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2)

dataset.name: Movements
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TIME AS MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_TO_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN ('A3854EH', 'A9215AJ', 'A2715EL', 'A5813EM', 'A5156EM', 'A4323DY', 'A8956EJ', 'A6158EL', 'A7500EK', 'A6038EL', 'A6729EL', 'A5360EM', 'A9398DZ', 'A3366EM', 'A1565DM', 'A1964EL', 'A1969EL', 'A1995AW', 'A5121EE', 'A5480EJ', 'A8783EK', 'A2046EM', FROM dataset_base_)
